  T2 
)
Value:
template<>              \
    struct AutopromoteTrait<T1>         \
    {               \
      typedef T2 T_type;          \
    }
#define ROBOPTIM_CORE_DECLARE_PRECISION (   T,
  rank 
)
Value:
template<>            \
    struct PrecisionTrait< T >        \
    {             \
      enum {            \
  precisionRank = rank,       \
  knowPrecisionRank = 1       \
      };            \
    }
